fields.title: Pumpkin Patch CAL launches
fields.summary: A cozy 2-week Crochet-Along featuring mini pumpkins and leaf coasters.
fields.body: We‚Äôre kicking off our Pumpkin Patch CAL on 2025-10-14. Daily tips, a printable checklist, and a prize draw for finishers! Materials: DK cotton, 3.5mm hook, stuffing.

fields.title: New Pattern: Lavender Ripple Throw
fields.summary: A gentle ripple blanket with lavender accents.
fields.body: Beginner-friendly ripple throw in 5 sizes with row counts and a colour planner. Intro price runs for one week.

fields.title: Yarn Substitution Guide (Updated)
fields.summary: Swap yarns without losing drape: fibre, WPI, gauge.
fields.body: Learn fibre blends, WPI, gauge swatching, and when to size up your hook. Includes a printable prompt card.

fields.title: Community Spotlight: @HookedOnTea
fields.summary: Meet Kira, who turns scrap yarn into pastel bunting.
fields.body: We chatted about sustainable stash-busting and her favourite 4mm hook that 'never leaves the project bag.'

fields.title: Site Update: Faster Pattern Search
fields.summary: Search is now 2√ó faster and supports tags + difficulty filters.
fields.body: We also added pagination (8 per page) and improved mobile card spacing.

fields.title: Mini Make: Mug Cozy in 20 Minutes
fields.summary: A stash-buster that keeps drinks warm.
fields.body: Uses ~15g of DK, 4mm hook, and a single wooden button. Perfect for gifts and markets.

fields.title: New Pattern: Cloud Puff Beanie
fields.summary: Squishy texture, topped with an optional pom.
fields.body: Includes baby‚Äìadult sizes and a seamless crown shaping video.

fields.title: Event Recap: Cozy Makers Market
fields.summary: Thank you for visiting our stall last weekend!
fields.body: Top sellers were the Daisy Coaster Sets and Pumpkin Keyrings. Photos now live in the gallery.

fields.title: Blocking 101: Make Stitches Bloom
fields.summary: Steam vs wet vs spray‚Äîwhen each method shines.
fields.body: Includes fibre-safe temperatures and a one-page cheat sheet.

fields.title: Sneak Peek: Winter Collection Palette
fields.summary: Frosted mint, cloudy lilac, snowfall cream.
fields.body: Vote on Instagram for the fourth accent colour!
